author: simonetripodi
msg: no needs to have apidocs in a subdir

author: marvin
msg: Ditch includes, go back to full Makefiles.
The attempt to abstract out the linker in the Charmonizer makefiles broke the
Unix build (though it had worked on Cygwin).  GCC/bash on Unix requires space
in "-o outfile", while link.exe requires *no* space in "/OUT:outfile".  This
incompatibility deep-sixed abstraction via Make variables and forces a return
